channel.title: Just for Laughs on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Just for Laughs on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: New Just For Laughs Fest Owner Tells Ticket Buyers: Laugh or Get a Refund
item.description: After taking the festival out of bankruptcy, Sylvain Parent-Bedard is confident that a once dominant stand-up showcase for Hollywood can be revived and thrive.

item.title: New Just For Laughs Fest Owner Tells Ticket Buyers: Laugh or Get a Refund
item.description: After taking the festival out of bankruptcy, Sylvain Parent-Bedard is confident that a once dominant stand-up showcase for Hollywood can be revived and thrive.

item.title: Just For Laughs: Tig Notaro, Fortune Feimster, Mae Martin to Receive Best Podcast Award
item.description: The trio of comedians will be honored at the Montreal comedy festival’s awards show on Friday.
